Achievements.Name: Western Arctic Bronze Badge
Achievements.Description: All three Main Hunts and the first Fishing Contest must be completed on Greenhorn Difficulty.

Achievements.Description: All three Main Hunts and the first Fishing Contest must be completed on Sportsman Difficulty.

Achievements.Name: Bear Buster Award
Achievements.Description: Take at least three different Male Bear Trophy Legends.

Achievements.Description: Take at least 10 different animals, with a bow, in Open Season.

Achievements.Description: Take at least 10 different animals, with a handgun, in Open Season.
